items.title: BBC News app
items.summary: Top stories, breaking news, live reporting, and follow news topics that match your interests

items.title: Colombia's foreign minister 'renounces' U.S. visa as tensions between both nations escalate
items.summary: The U.S. State Department revoked President Petro's visa on Friday after he participated in a New York protest against the war in Gaza

items.title: 2 killed, 5 wounded when man opened fire in casino parking lot in Texas, authorities say
items.summary: Keryan Rashad Jones, 34, was arrested during a traffic stop several hours after the shooting late September 27 night at the Kickapoo Lucky Eagle Casino in Eagle Pass, authorities said

items.title: Tharoor flags concerns over Air India Express plans to curtail Kerala flights
items.summary: Any curtailment of services at this stage will inevitably cause severe hardship to migrant workers, students, tourists and families, while also hampering trade and tourism, Shashi Tharoor says

items.title: Trump’s Gaza peace plan: What’s in the 20-point peace proposal?
items.summary: Here are the main elements of the plan that resulted from intense negotiations in recent weeks between Donald Trump and his team, and Israeli and Arab leaders

items.title: Morning Digest: White House releases Gaza peace plan on hostage release and ending of Gaza war; TVK district secretary picked up for police inquiry on Karur stampede, and more

items.title: Puducherry CM urges Centre to secure release of fishermen from Sri Lanka’s custody
Puducherry police issue advisory against fraudulent online job offers
A timely BCG vaccine shot lowers neonatal mortality risk, JIPMER study finds
On World Heart Day, doctors stress on importance of cardiac health
Madras Chamber of Commerce and Industry celebrates 189th Chamber Day
UPSC finalises panel of three officers fit for appointment as T.N. DGP
items.summary: Once the panel is received, the State would have to immediately appoint one of the officers as a regular DGP/HoPF with a minimum tenure of two years in compliance with the Supreme Court order.

items.title: YouTube to pay $24.5 million to settle 2021 lawsuit by Donald Trump over account suspension
items.summary: The settlement does not constitute an admission of liability, the filing says; Google confirmed the settlement but declined to comment beyond it.

items.title: Venezuela's President Maduro signs decree granting security powers in case of military intervention
items.summary: The measure comes as the U.S. has deployed a fleet of warships in the Caribbean, which Washington says is to combat drug trafficking through the region; Maduro's government alleges that the U.S. is plotting to remove him from power.

items.title: Sociology student from Mumbai wins Srinivas Rayaprol Poetry Prize 2025
items.summary: The prize, including a citation and cash award of ₹15,000, will be presented on October 25, marking the birth centenary of Srinivas Rayaprol.

items.title: Measures being taken to improve Ease of Doing Business, says Vizag Collector
items.summary: Workshop organised to create awareness among industrialists and entrepreneurs on the reforms brought in by the government

items.title: Odisha Cabinet approves 10-hour shifts; allows night shifts for women
items.summary: The overtime work limit has been increased from 115 hours to 144 hours every financial quarter.

items.title: J&K student assaulted by right-wing activists in M.P. for entering garba event

items.summary: The BJP had in its 2014 Assembly election manifesto promised that after forming the government, unrecognised schools would be granted one-time permanent affiliation by easing the norms

items.title: Chennai Bus app all set for revamp as MTC’s digitisation project nears completion
items.summary: The app will be migrated to a new platform next month; commuter says move essential as the app does not include all the buses; digital boards installed at more than 600 bus stops and termini

items.title: Chennai Corporation’s unclear rules on construction and demolition, bulk waste disposal leave residents frustrated
items.summary: They allege instances of unauthorised dumping, unofficial charges, and poor enforcement by officials

items.title: CSL expands CSR footprint into community-driven agriculture projects
items.summary: CSL to back three major agriculture projects related to precision farming, including revival of a sprawling paddy field, installation of weather monitoring systems, and setting up a climate-resilient paddy processing unit

items.title: Afghanistan telecom blackout as Taliban shuts off internet
items.summary: Phone and internet connections are down nationwide after the Taliban cut fibre-optic connections to prevent "immorality".

items.title: Bank of Baroda, IIFL Finance enter into co-lending partnership
items.summary: Bank of Baroda and IIFL Finance have entered into a co-lending partnership to offer gold loans primarily targeted at unbanked customer segments across semi-urban and rural India

items.title: Trump and Netanyahu agree new Gaza peace plan
items.summary: The US and Israeli leaders said they have agreed a peace plan for Gaza and warned Hamas to accept it.

items.title: White House releases Gaza peace plan as Trump meets Netanyahu
items.summary: Trump said Israel to withdraw from Gaza ‘in phases’ under the deal; Hamas negotiators will review the plan ‘in good faith’ and provide response, an official said.

items.title: ​​Labour Conference: Starmer Calls Reform Plans Racist
items.summary: ​​Keir Starmer calls Reform migrant policy 'racist' and 'immoral'.

items.title: Four youths held, minor boy booked for looting 1.5 kg gold from jewellery shop worker in Mangaluru
items.summary: The Mangaluru police arrested four youths and booked a minor boy in connection with the looting of 1.5 kg gold from a jewellery shop worker by first waylaying his scooter and then abducting him in a car and assaulting him in the city on September 26

items.title: Madagascar President dissolves government following massive protests
items.summary: Inspired by the so-called Gen Z protests in Kenya and Nepal, the three days of demonstrations are the largest the Indian Ocean island has seen in years.

items.title: U.S. tariffs will have long-term effect on trade: Commerce Ministry to PAC
items.summary: Tariffs will significantly impact India’s marine exports, especially shrimp; Centre working on market diversification pushing for registration of more export units in the EU, and engaging in discussions with other countries, says Special Secretary

items.title: Order restricting transfers in view of SIR revoked in two days
